name: ai-powered-web-testing-agent
description: AI-Powered Web Testing Agent with Playwright integration

scripts.setup: npm run setup-env && npm install && npm run install-browsers
scripts.setup-env: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('.env')) { fs.copyFileSync('.env.example', '.env'); console.log('✅ Created .env file from template'); } else { console.log('ℹ️ .env file already exists'); }"
